content: Such a force. I have kept a couple of things she said close to me. “I think people confuse celebrity with acceptance, with love, with approval. These people are going to love you, then you can love yourself. It’s attention, how bad can attention be?” hmmmm. That is the tip of the iceberg for her wisdom. Her mom had that same wit. They both are every day philosophers. I am so glad we have a lot of video of both of them as performers and as people. Thanks so much for the article!
